definition: acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: Objective Establish the quality standards for Jiere Xiaoyan Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高解热消炎胶囊的质量标准。

sentences.english: Refrigeration by means of negative heat of dissolution of inorganic salts is a low consumption cooling method.
sentences.chinese: 采用无机盐的负溶解热制冷是一种低能耗的制冷方法。

sentences.english: Non-aspirin fever reducers can be used to reduce a fever.
sentences.chinese: 不含阿斯匹林的解热药可以用来退烧。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the effects of powders with different diameters of schizonepeta on anti-pyretic and analgesic effects.
sentences.chinese: 目的荆芥不同粒径粉体的解热镇痛作用的比较研究。

sentences.english: The measurement in heat of fusion of ice is one of experiments in thermodynamics done in many universities.
sentences.chinese: 冰的熔解热的测量是许多高校所开设的热学实验之一。

sentences.english: Gurcke has antipyretic, analgesic and anti- inflammatory effects.
sentences.chinese: 提示赛葵具有解热镇痛抗炎作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To observe the anti - infection and anti - pyretic effect in vivo of Minor Decoction of Bupleurum ( Xiaochaihu Tang ) .
sentences.chinese: 目的观察中药制剂小柴胡汤体内抗感染及解热作用。

sentences.english: Objective:To Observe the febrifuge effect of antivirus capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察安替威胶囊的解热作用。

sentences.english: Don't drink alcohol or beverage with alcohol while taking analgesics and antipyretics .
sentences.chinese: 服用解热镇痛工时，不能同时饮酒或含有酒精的饮料。

sentences.english: Refreshing antipyretic drugs, consumption of a variety mungbean porridge.
sentences.chinese: 消暑解热毒，常饮绿豆粥。

sentences.english: This seasonal food wants can disappear heat solution is hot, diuresis detumescence .
sentences.chinese: 这个季节的食物要能消暑解热，利尿消肿。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the antipyretic mechanism of Naoreqing oral solution (NOS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脑热清口服液的解热机制。

sentences.english: Objective To research the mechanism of aqueous extract of Radix Scutellariae in relieving fever of model rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨黄芩水提物对干酵母致热大鼠解热作用机制。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the anti inflammatory and antipyretic effects of Huanggui enema.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究黄桂灌肠剂的抗炎与解热镇痛作用。

sentences.english: These products are used for pain, fever, colds and sleeplessness
sentences.chinese: 这些药用于止痛，解热，感冒和失眠。

sentences.english: So the rational prescription of it is important, especially in children.
sentences.chinese: 对于婴儿这一特殊群体，解热药的合理使用非常重要。

definition: to alleviate fever (medicine)/to clear internal heat (Chinese medicine)
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
(TCM) to relieve inflamation and internal heat/to detoxify
to moisten the lungs/to make expectoration easy (medicine)
